response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and preferences. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $10,000 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only its market value but also the opportunity for you to acquire it at a competitive rate compared to its worth. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 10000}
